mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, username, password, nickname, name, email, phone, regdate, news_email, gender, birth_date, signout, user_role, user_level, user_point, postcode, address, address_detail) values ( users_user_id_seq.nextval,#{username},#{password},#{nickname},#{name}, #{email},#{phone},SYSDATE,#{news_email},#{gender},#{birth_date},'N','ROLE_USER', '기본',0,#{postcode},#{address},#{address_detail} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where username=#{username}
